title: Set a Cash PIN for Your Cash App Account
summary: Secure your Cash App account in five simple steps. This guide walks you through enabling a four-digit Cash PIN for added security.
table_of_contents: Go to Your Privacy & Security Settings

steps.description: Set up a four-digit personal identification number (PIN) as an added layer of protection for your Cash App account. This takes less than five minutes.
Find your avatar icon in the top right corner of the screen, to the right of the clock symbol. Click it to open settings.
Clicking the avatar icon brings you to the settings page.

steps.step: Go to Your Privacy & Security Settings
steps.description: On the settings page, scroll to the fifth option labeled 'Privacy & Security' and click it.
Click the 'Security Lock' toggle. When it turns green, you’ll be prompted to enter a four-digit PIN using the on-screen keypad.

notes: After setting your Cash PIN, you will be asked to enter it when sending money.
To turn off Security Lock or change your PIN, you must re-enter your existing PIN.
Cash App will notify you by email if your PIN is changed.
author: M’Shai S. Dash
